attributes.action: Search ALL vehicles entering the UK for illegal immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If ALL HGV's, irrespective of nationality, wishing to enter the UK were subjected to a thorough search for illegal immigrants, this would be more effective than the system we have now. Every HGV should be off loaded if necessary to ensure there is nobody hiding on the vehicle. The time all this would take would ensure a huge backlog through the French ports, thus creating gridlock throughout the French towns forcing them in to action.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
